tasks.title: Implement User Authentication System
tasks.description: Create a secure JWT-based authentication system with refresh tokens, password hashing, and role-based access control

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for the task management system with proper relationships and indexes

tasks.title: Setup Development Environment
tasks.description: Configure IDE, install dependencies, setup Git repository, and create initial project structure

tasks.title: Fix Critical Security Vulnerability
tasks.description: Address SQL injection vulnerability in user input validation and implement proper input sanitization

tasks.title: Build RESTful API Endpoints
tasks.description: Create comprehensive REST API endpoints for task management with proper error handling and validation

tasks.title: Implement Task Filtering and Search
tasks.description: Add advanced filtering capabilities by status, priority, assignee, and date ranges with search functionality

tasks.title: Write API Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive API documentation using Swagger/OpenAPI with examples and response schemas

tasks.title: Add Real-time Notifications
tasks.description: Implement WebSocket-based real-time notifications for task updates, assignments, and status changes
